titleStmt.title: A consolatory poem humbly addressed to Her Royal Highness upon the much lamented death of His Most Illustrious Highness, William, Duke of Glocester / by Dr. Gibbs.
titleStmt.author: Gibbs, James, d. 1724.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Hartley, and sold by John Nutt,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
